summary:
----------Warning!------------
This DLC was onbly voice translated to Russian. Other parts like Dialogues and
Quests were not translated (They are still on English)! Feel free to download it!
descriptionHtml:
====================================================================
This DLC was translated to Russian. However the only thing that was translated is Voice Acting. Which means Dialogues and other stuff (Map Markers, Quests) were not.

Please Read The following:

This only affects the content of the DLC, which means vanilla Voice acting will not be changed!!!

Feel free to download it!
author: Bethesda Game Studios
